original_text: The man who rides on the white horse has a name that is written on his shirt. It is also written high on his leg. His name is: ‘The King who rules over all other kings. The Lord who rules over all lords’. 19: These verses describe Jesus. He is the great King who will win against all his enemies. The man who rides on the white horse has a name that is written on his shirt. It is also written high on his leg. His name is: ‘The King who rules over all other kings. The Lord who rules over all lords’.
korean_text: 그 옷과 그 다리에 이름을 쓴 것이 있으니 만왕의 왕이요 만주의 주라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The man who rides on the white horse
has a name that is written on his shirt
It is also written high on his leg
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 다리 높은 곳에도 쓰여 있습니다

sentences.original_text: The King who rules over all other kings
The Lord who rules over all lords
who will win against all his enemies
The man who rides on the white horse
has a name that is written on his shirt
It is also written high on his leg
